SqlOutput.Sql: CASE WHEN COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber3__c, 0) >= 0 THEN ROUND(CASE WHEN (COALESCE($!s0s!$.customcheckbox1__c, '0') = '1') THEN COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber1__c, 0) ELSE COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c, 0) END, COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber3__c, 0)) ELSE ROUND(CASE WHEN (COALESCE($!s0s!$.customcheckbox1__c, '0') = '1') THEN COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber1__c, 0) ELSE COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c, 0) END*POWER(10,COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber3__c, 0)))/POWER(10,COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber3__c, 0)) END

CASE WHEN $!s0s!$.customnumber3__c >= 0 THEN ROUND(CASE WHEN (COALESCE($!s0s!$.customcheckbox1__c, '0') = '1') THEN $!s0s!$.customnumber1__c ELSE $!s0s!$.customnumber2__c END, $!s0s!$.customnumber3__c) ELSE ROUND(CASE WHEN (COALESCE($!s0s!$.customcheckbox1__c, '0') = '1') THEN $!s0s!$.customnumber1__c ELSE $!s0s!$.customnumber2__c END*POWER(10,$!s0s!$.customnumber3__c))/POWER(10,$!s0s!$.customnumber3__c) END
